Class Main

java.lang.Object
Main
public class Main extends Object
The main entry point for the Data Management System (DMS) application.

This class initializes the database connection dialog and, upon a successful connection, launches the main Movie Graphical User Interface (GUI).

Role in the System:

  • Starts the DMS application execution.
  • Handles the initial database connection setup through DBConnectionDialog.
  • Initializes the MovieDatabaseManager to manage movie records once connected.

Dependencies: Requires the following classes to function:

  • DBConnectionDialog — for database connection input and validation.
  • MovieDatabaseManager — for managing database operations (CRUD).
  • MovieGUI — for rendering the main user interface.

Error Handling:

If the user cancels the connection dialog or fails to connect, the program safely terminates with a status message in the console.

Example Usage:


 // Run the DMS application
 public static void main(String[] args) {
     Main.main(args);
 }

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Launches the Data Management System application.

      This method first opens a connection dialog using DBConnectionDialog. If a valid database connection is obtained, it initializes a MovieDatabaseManager and launches the MovieGUI.

      Parameters:
      args - command-line arguments (not used in this application)
